Export.Routine:
WWWINTER ;WWWINTER;DR;BEISPIEL MANUELLER AUFRUF AUS DEM INTERNET;22.04.2000 ; Compiled February 9, 2005 13:04:01 ; ;/------------------------------------------------------------------\ ;| Description of Function : ;| BEISPIEL MANUELLER AUFRUF AUS DEM INTERNET ;| ;| Inputs : ;| ;| ;| ByRef : ;| ;| ;| Returns : ;| ;| ;| History : ;| ;| 19-Nov-2009 shobby SR17032: Disabled 'NumberOfHits' functionality. ;| DR 22.04.2000 ;| ;\------------------------------------------------------------------/ ; ;AUFRUF /scripts/mgwms32.dll?MGWLPN=LOCAL&EP=WWWINTER&YM=MANDANT&YUCI=INTRAPREND&YPARA=~&VARIABLE=INHALT NEW (%request,%session,%KEY,%,%ZCS,%CGIEVAR) DO ^WWWVAR ;VORGABEN SETZEN ;typeset SET YFORM="XXX" ;WENN FORULARDATEN NÃ–TIG ;when necessary IF '$DATA(^WWW120(0,YFORM)) DO ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(35)) QUIT ;FALSCHE FORM ;shape DO ^WWWFORMX ;VORGABEN AUS WWW012 MANDANT ;out of Company ;SET $PIECE(^WWW120(0,YFORM,1),Y,50)=$PIECE($GET(^WWW120(0,YFORM,1)),Y,50)+1 ;ANZAHL DER HITS ;$$$WWW120NumberOfHits ;SR17032 SET YI=$GET(^WWW1205(YM,YFORM,$PIECE($HOROLOG,",",1),1))+1 SET ^WWW1205(YM,YFORM,$PIECE($HOROLOG,",",1),1)=YI ;ANZAHL DER ZUGRIFFE PER DATUM ;Number the Date ;START HTML ;take-off HTML DO ^WWWSTART("SUCHE",1,0) DO ^WWWBODY(1) ;BODY TAG DO START DO STOP QUIT START ;START FORM ;take-off shape SET YKOPF=$GET(YKOPF) ;KOPFSATZ ANZEIGEN ;display IF $PIECE(YVOR,Y,10)=1 WRITE "
" IF '$FIND($TRANSLATE(YKOPF,"gif","GIF"),".GIF") DO . DO ^WWWKOPF(YKOPF) . QUIT IF $PIECE(YVOR,Y,65)=1 DO ^WWWUP(0) ;START ;take-off IF YKOPF'="" IF $FIND($TRANSLATE(YKOPF,"gif","GIF"),".GIF") WRITE YCR,"" IF $PIECE(YVOR,Y,10)=1 WRITE "
" WRITE YCR IF +$PIECE(YVOR,Y,13)=1 DO ;RAHMEN ;framework . DO ^WWWFRAME(2) ;FRAME OHNE % ;without . WRITE "" . QUIT WRITE YCR WRITE "" IF $PIECE(YVOR,Y,9)=""!($PIECE(YVOR,Y,21)=1) WRITE "
"
	IF $FIND($PIECE(YVOR,Y,8),1) WRITE ""
	IF $FIND($PIECE(YVOR,Y,8),2) WRITE ""
	IF $FIND($PIECE(YVOR,Y,8),3) WRITE ""
	IF $FIND($PIECE(YVOR,Y,8),4) WRITE ""
	IF $FIND($PIECE(YVOR,Y,8),5) WRITE ""
	IF $PIECE(YVOR,Y,10)=1 WRITE "
"
	DO
	. WRITE YCR,""
	
	;HIER MANUELL ;here is 
	IF $PIECE(YVOR,Y,44)'=1!(YFOART=3) WRITE YCR,"
"  ;FORMAT
	IF +$PIECE(YVOR,Y,13)=1 WRITE YCR,""  ;RAHMEN ;framework 
	
	;WRITE YCR,YCR,"",YCR,YCR
	
	IF $PIECE(YVOR,Y,10)=1!(YFOART=3) WRITE YCR,"
"
	IF $FIND($PIECE(YVOR,Y,8),1) WRITE ""
	IF $FIND($PIECE(YVOR,Y,8),2) WRITE ""
	IF $FIND($PIECE(YVOR,Y,8),3) WRITE ""
	IF $FIND($PIECE(YVOR,Y,8),4) WRITE ""
	IF $FIND($PIECE(YVOR,Y,8),5) WRITE ""
	IF $PIECE(YVOR,Y,9)=""!($PIECE(YVOR,Y,21)=1) WRITE "
" WRITE "" WRITE YCR,"" ;W "" QUIT STOP ;ENDE FORM ;termination shape DO ^WWWSTOP WRITE "" SET %KEY=YKEY QUIT
